channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 12th September
item.description:
A lot of rubbish on the green near the ally at number 41 dale road please clear urgently
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dale Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering near 12 Langford Close, 12th September
item.description:
A bin has been opened and there is litter and food everywhere on Langford Close
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Langford Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Taxis, cars and vans parked in the cycle lane, 12th September
item.description:
Yesterday I was trying to cycle south on Barnsbury road, Islington, and there were several taxis, vans and lorries parked on the cycle lane, completely blocking it. There was a lot of other traffic so I had to walk my bike on the pavement to get past. Please enforce the free passage of cyclists here, as I fear it could be very dangerous for cyclists here if the illegal parking goes unchecked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Penton Street, Barnsbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bag of rubbish dumped on pavement, 12th September
item.description:
Looks like a clothes collection bag. It's not been collected and has been got at by foxes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, York Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post missing, 12th September
item.description:
As recently reported the post that was supposed to stop vehicles from entering the grass verge has been removed there has now been two more posts removed the 3 posts need to be replaced asap as cars and vans are driving along the pavement and damaging the slabs and grass
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
